title: Add Friends from Club Page!
body: Can you make it possible to add friends from viewing the club page?

replies.body: Ayyyyy that honestly sounds like a pretty good idea! It's not a stretch to think you'd want to be friends with your club members, and I can see why you'd want that process to be a little more streamlined. Take this idea over to the [**Client Discussion**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) forum to get the devs attention!
